oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Your Hit Parade - 1950-07-01 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: NBC program Your Hit Parade, originally broadcast 1950-07-01, part 1. With announcer André Baruch and featuring performers Snooky Lanson, Eileen Wilson, the Hit Paraders, and Raymond Scott and the Lucky Strike Orchestra. As recorded by station WSM, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eileen Wilson; Snooky Lanson; Hit Paraders; Raymond Scott; Lucky Strike Orchestra
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Lucky Strike commercial -- Lucky Strike jingle -- Opening theme -- Opening statement (André Baruch) -- The Old Piano Roll Blues (Eileen Wilson, Snooky Lanson) -- André Baruch introduces Raymond Scott -- Who Cares? (Raymond Scott and the Lucky Strike Orchestra) -- André Baruch introduces Eileen Wilson -- I Wanna Be Loved (Eileen Wilson) -- André Baruch introduces Snooky Lanson -- Sentimental Me (Snooky Lanson, Hit Paraders) -- Lucky Strike commercial -- André Baruch introduces Raymond Scott -- You're A Grand Old Flag (Raymond Scott and the Lucky Strike Orchestra, Hit Paraders) -- André Baruch introduces Eileen Wilson -- I Don't Care If The Sun Don't Shine (Eileen Wilson)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: National Broadcasting Company; Your hit parade (Radio program); Baruch, Andre; Hit Paraders (Musical group); Scott, Raymond, 1908-1994; Lucky Strike Orchestra; Lanson, Snooky; Wilson, Eileen (Vocalist)
